channel.title: CVE Feed for Rockwell Automation -- Modbus TCP Server Add On Instructions
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rockwell Automation -- Modbus TCP Server Add On Instructions

item.title: CVE-2023-0027|2023-03-17T16:52:21.564Z -- rockwell%20automation -- modbus%20tcp%20server%20add%20on%20instructions
item.description: Rockwell Automation Modbus TCP Server AOI prior to 2.04.00 is vulnerable to an unauthorized user sending a malformed message that could cause the controller to respond with a copy of the most recent response to the last valid request. If exploited, an unauthorized user could read the connected deviceâ€™s Modbus TCP Server AOI information.
